fields.plot: Self-proclaimed stuntman Rod Kimble is preparing for the jump of his life - to clear fifteen buses to raise money for his abusive stepfather Frank's life-saving heart operation.
fields.name: Hot Rod

fields.plot: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring...
fields.name: The Man from Earth

fields.plot: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastical story about 5 mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur as the tale advances.
fields.name: The Fall
fields.writer: Dan Gilroy, Nico Soultanakis, Tarsem Singh, Valeri Petrov

fields.plot: An ancient struggle re-erupts on Earth between two extraterrestrial clans, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a young teenager.
fields.name: Transformers
fields.writer: Roberto Orci, Alex Kurtzman, John Rogers, Roberto Orci, Alex Kurtzman
